mapper.select: SELECT PERSONAL.PERSONAL_NUMBER, PERSONAL.PERSONAL_NAME, PERSONAL.PERSONAL_ID , PERSONAL.PERSONAL_NICKNAME, PERSONAL.PERMISSION, PERSONAL.PERSONAL_CREATE_DATE , PERSONAL.PERSONAL_MODIFY_DATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, P.PERSONAL_NUMBER, P.PERSONAL_NAME, P.PERSONAL_ID , P.PERSONAL_NICKNAME, P.PERMISSION, P.PERSONAL_CREATE_DATE, P.PERSONAL_MODIFY_DATE FROM( SELECT PERSONAL_NUMBER, PERSONAL_NAME, PERSONAL_ID,PERSONAL_NICKNAME , PERMISSION, PERSONAL_CREATE_DATE, PERSONAL_MODIFY_DATE FROM PERSONAL ORDER BY PERSONAL_CREATE_DATE DESC ) P ) PERSONAL

SELECT PERSONAL.PERSONAL_NUMBER, PERSONAL.PERSONAL_NAME, PERSONAL.PERSONAL_ID , PERSONAL.PERSONAL_NICKNAME, PERSONAL.PERMISSION, PERSONAL.PERSONAL_CREATE_DATE , PERSONAL.PERSONAL_MODIFY_DATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, P.PERSONAL_NUMBER, P.PERSONAL_NAME, P.PERSONAL_ID , P.PERSONAL_NICKNAME, P.PERMISSION, P.PERSONAL_CREATE_DATE, P.PERSONAL_MODIFY_DATE FROM( SELECT PERSONAL_NUMBER, PERSONAL_NAME, PERSONAL_ID,PERSONAL_NICKNAME , PERMISSION, PERSONAL_CREATE_DATE, PERSONAL_MODIFY_DATE FROM PERSONAL ORDER BY PERSONAL_NUMBER ) P ) PERSONAL

SELECT PERSONAL_NUMBER, PERSONAL_ID, PERSONAL_PASSWORD, PERSONAL_NICKNAME , PERSONAL_PHONENUMBER, PERSONAL_EMAIL, PERSONAL_KEYWORD, PERMISSION, PERSONAL_COMPANY FROM PERSONAL WHERE PERSONAL_ID = #{perId} AND PERSONAL_PASSWORD = #{perPwd}

SELECT PER.PERSONAL_NUMBER AS "perNo", RESUME.RESUME_PERSONAL_NAME AS "perName" , PERSONAL.PERSONAL_COMPANY AS "currentCompany" , RESUME.RESUME_EDUCATION_NAME AS "perHighestEdu" , RESUME.RESUME_EDUCATION_MAJOR AS "perHighestEduMajor" , RESUME.RESUME_EDUCATION_GRADE AS "perHighestEduGrade", RESUME.RESUME_CAREER_NAME AS "perCampany" , RESUME.RESUME_CAREER_BEGIN_DATE AS "perCareerBeginDate" , RESUME.RESUME_CAREER_END_DATE AS "perCareerEndDate" , NVL(RESUME.RESUME_LICENSE_NAME , ' ') AS "perLicense" , NVL(REGEXP_COUNT(RESUME.RESUME_LICENSE_NAME, ',')+1, 0) AS "perLicenseCount" , PER.RECOMMEND_PREFER AS "comPrefer" , PER.RECOMMEND_TOTAL_RATE AS "recommendTotalRate" FROM ( SELECT REC.PERSONAL_NUMBER, REC.RECOMMEND_PREFER, REC.RECOMMEND_TOTAL_RATE FROM RECOMMEND REC WHERE REC.COMPANY_NUMBER = #{comNo} ) PER INNER JOIN RESUME RESUME ON PER.PERSONAL_NUMBER = RESUME.PERSONAL_NUMBER INNER JOIN PERSONAL PERSONAL ON RESUME.PERSONAL_NUMBER = PERSONAL.PERSONAL_NUMBER
PER.RECOMMEND_TOTAL_RATE >= #{talentScore}
AND
RESUME.RESUME_EDUCATION_NAME LIKE '%고등학교'
RESUME.RESUME_EDUCATION_NAME LIKE '%전문대%' AND RESUME.RESUME_EDUCATION_NAME NOT LIKE '%대학교%'
RESUME.RESUME_EDUCATION_NAME LIKE '%대학교%'
AND
NVL(REGEXP_COUNT(RESUME.RESUME_LICENSE_NAME, ',')+1, 0) <= 1
NVL(REGEXP_COUNT(RESUME.RESUME_LICENSE_NAME, ',')+1, 0) >= 1 AND NVL(REGEXP_COUNT(RESUME.RESUME_LICENSE_NAME, ',')+1, 0) <= 3
NVL(REGEXP_COUNT(RESUME.RESUME_LICENSE_NAME, ',')+1, 0) >= 3
AND
${search} LIKE '%${searchText}%'
ORDER BY PER.RECOMMEND_TOTAL_RATE DESC

SELECT RESUME_NUMBER, RESUME_PERSONAL_NAME, RESUME_PERSONAL_BIRTHDAY, RESUME_PERSONAL_EMAIL , RESUME_PERSONAL_PHONENUMBER, RESUME_PERSONAL_ADDRESS, RESUME_PERSONAL_MARRY , RESUME_PERSONAL_GENDER, RESUME_PERSONAL_MILITARY, RESUME_EDUCATION_BEGIN_DATE , RESUME_EDUCATION_END_DATE, RESUME_EDUCATION_NAME, RESUME_EDUCATION_MAJOR , RESUME_EDUCATION_LOCATION, RESUME_EDUCATION_GRADE, RESUME_EDUCATION_GRADUATE , RESUME_CAREER_BEGIN_DATE, RESUME_CAREER_END_DATE, RESUME_CAREER_NAME , RESUME_CAREER_POSITION, RESUME_CAREER_LOCATION, RESUME_CAREER_JOB, RESUME_LICENSE_DATE , RESUME_LICENSE_NAME, RESUME_LICENSE_INSTITUTION, RESUME_LICENSE_GRADE, PERSONAL_NUMBER FROM RESUME WHERE PERSONAL_NUMBER = #{perNo}

SELECT CAREER_NUMBER, CAREER_BEGIN_DATE, CAREER_END_DATE , CAREER_NAME, CAREER_POSITION, CAREER_LOCATION, CAREER_JOB, RESUME_NUMBER FROM CAREER WHERE CAREER_NUMBER = #{carNo} ORDER BY CAREER_BEGIN_DATE DESC

SELECT EDUCATION_NUMBER, EDUCATION_BEGIN_DATE, EDUCATION_END_DATE , EDUCATION_NAME, EDUCATION_MAJOR, EDUCATION_GRADE, EDUCATION_LOCATION , EDUCATION_GREADUATE, RESUME_NUMBER FROM EDUCATION WHERE EDUCATION_NUMBER = #{eduNo} ORDER BY EDUCATION_BEGIN_DATE DESC

SELECT CAREER_NUMBER, CAREER_BEGIN_DATE, CAREER_END_DATE , CAREER_NAME, CAREER_POSITION, CAREER_LOCATION, CAREER_JOB, RESUME_NUMBER FROM CAREER WHERE RESUME_NUMBER = #{resumeNo} ORDER BY CAREER_BEGIN_DATE DESC

SELECT EDUCATION_NUMBER, EDUCATION_BEGIN_DATE, EDUCATION_END_DATE , EDUCATION_NAME, EDUCATION_MAJOR, EDUCATION_GRADE, EDUCATION_LOCATION , EDUCATION_GREADUATE, RESUME_NUMBER FROM EDUCATION WHERE RESUME_NUMBER = #{resumeNo} ORDER BY EDUCATION_BEGIN_DATE DESC
SELECT LETTER_NUMBER, LETTER_HISTORY, LETTER_MOTIVATION , LETTER_CHARACTER, LETTER_GOAL FROM LETTER WHERE PERSONAL_NUMBER = #{perNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTER VALUE(LETTER_NUMBER, LETTER_HISTORY, LETTER_MOTIVATION , LETTER_CHARACTER, LETTER_GOAL, PERSONAL_NUMBER) VALUES(LETTER_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{history}, #{motivation}, #{character} , LETTER_GOAL = #{goal}, #{perNo})

INSERT INTO EDUCATION VALUE(EDUCATION_NUMBER, EDUCATION_BEGIN_DATE, EDUCATION_END_DATE, EDUCATION_NAME ,EDUCATION_MAJOR, EDUCATION_GRADE, EDUCATION_LOCATION, EDUCATION_GREADUATE, RESUME_NUMBER) VALUES(EDUCATION_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{eduBeginDate}, #{eduEndDate}, #{eduName} , #{eduMajor}, #{eduGrade}, #{eduLocation}, #{eduGreaduate}, #{resumeNo})

INSERT INTO CAREER
VALUE(CAREER_NUMBER, CAREER_BEGIN_DATE, CAREER_NAME, CAREER_POSITION ,CAREER_LOCATION, CAREER_JOB, RESUME_NUMBER) VALUES(CAREER_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{carBeginDate} ,#{carName}, #{carPosition}, #{carLocation}, #{carJob}, #{resumeNo})
VALUE(CAREER_NUMBER, CAREER_BEGIN_DATE, CAREER_END_DATE, CAREER_NAME, CAREER_POSITION ,CAREER_LOCATION, CAREER_JOB, RESUME_NUMBER) VALUES(CAREER_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{carBeginDate}, #{carEndDate} , #{carName}, #{carPosition}, #{carLocation}, #{carJob}, #{resumeNo})
